# delegate

**Instance Property**

The page controller’s delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBOutlet @MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSPageControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must conform to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageControllerDelegate] protocol.

## Customizing the Paged Interface Behavior

- **NSPageControllerDelegate**: The `NSPageControllerDelegate` protocol allows you to customize the behavior of instances of the NSPageController class.
